TAYLOR Surname Meaning & Origin: An English occupational name for a tailor, from Old French tailleur for tailor which comes from the Latin taliare, meaning to cut.. Taylor is among the most commonly found surnames, due to its popularity as a medieval occupation. Surname Origin: English.
